website_summaries.verdict: Though the material could be sturdier, you won't find a better deal on Christmas stockings than this 12-pack. Plus, they have the traditional look.
pros: Classic looking Christmas stockings and a solid deal
You get a 12-pack of 15-inch red stockings with the traditional white trim cuffs
A great deal for groups and larger families
cons: The felt material is somewhat thin, and an occasional stocking is a bit misshapen

customer_reviews.title: Economical Stockings
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are not expensive--about $1.25/stocking--and considering the price, these work great. I bought a couple dozen for staff to decorate and hang in the break room. They have worked great for that purpose. The stockings are not very thick, but again, they are cheap in price. If you are looking to buy a bunch of stockings and not spend a fortune, these should work well. In one picture, only the red stockings are the Windy City Novelties 15" Red Felt Stockings. It has been a good, cheap way to help co-workers get in a festive mood. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 packs of these for small office gifts, and they work perfectly for that at a great price. The fabric bonds with glitter glue (for names) very well. As others have said these are not very large (see photo for scale) but holds candies, cards, and small gifts such as ornaments or pens very well. The quality is great for one or two uses, actually better than expected for the price, but I would not recommend these as year-to-year stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.

customer_reviews.title: FELT IS BEAUTIFUL & GREAT
customer_reviews.text: BIG FAMILY? I ORDERED AND RECIEVED IN TWO DAYS. READY FOR NAMES AND STUFFING, NOT EVEN T'SGIVING YET, FELT IS BEAUTIFUL & GREAT, GOLD TRIM SET'S THEM OFF VERY GOOD. 15 INCHES DEEP WILL HOLD LOT'S OF STUFF, NOW GOTTA GET A LOAN SO I CAN FILL'EM, BUT THE LOOK ON THEIR FACES AT CHRISTMAS TIME,IS WHAT SANTA IS ABOUT HUH? THESE STOCKINGS WILL FIT YOUR FAMILY AND I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM. C W FROST
customer_reviews.author: C. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, fast delivery, and great price. I used them to make some custom stockings for family. Worked well in my heat press.
customer_reviews.author: Benita Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great stockings for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pack of these for a ‘Christmas in july’ event at work. The event included a stocking decorating contest and this was the best deal we could find (esp in July). They are decent quality for the price and everyone had fun decorating! I covered mine with felt and used fabri-tax glue. It didn’t take long to dry and stayed on well. I would efinagelt purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: HeyDay!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a large quantity of these stockings. It was a realty good value for a large youth project. The kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: JBCcoach

customer_reviews.title: Basically disposable, but fine.
customer_reviews.text: These are very inexpensive stockings and the quality is about what you would expect for the price. I thought we might be able to use these year after year, but several stockings had structural blow-outs after being hung stuffed with lots of gifts (granted, we definitely OVER-stuffed them). They worked fine for what we were doing and the price was right. Just don't expect plush velvet or good quality. These are one-use stockings if you're going to put anything in them.
customer_reviews.author: Elemar

customer_reviews.title: Basic Felt Stockings
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cheap stockings for a white elephant stocking stuffer exchange that we are doing with our family. These worked out perfect for the price. They are made of very thin felt and don't feel very durable (it'll rip easily if over stuffed), but they are exactly what I expected for the price. If you're looking for something cheap to hang for decoration or something for a one time use, these will probably work for you.
customer_reviews.author: MiMommy77

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material and the loop to hang it with, was not effective. Good color and feel, but also smaller than I would have liked to match the others I have. But given the price, others may find them acceptable buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elbridge W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and traditional Christmas Stocking
customer_reviews.text: The stockings have a traditional felt look and feel. Plenty big enough for all your stocking stuffing needs. Being 15" tall and 5 inches wide, it affords a lot of room for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Berlon Burch

customer_reviews.title: The stockings are not the advertised size.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the stockings because they were too small and didn't match the size I was needing to go with the stockings I already have. Stockings looked good and matched the design of my current stockings, but were too small.
customer_reviews.author: C Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, but thin
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for bulk stockings these for the bill. They are thin and don’t hold a ton. We used them for my sons hockey team. I pressed #’s to the white part.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: these are fantastic. I was able to decorate how I wanted
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are fantastic. I was able to decorate how I wanted, with plenty of extra in case I messed up. Only downside was the fabric that hangs the stocking was pretty worthless. Couldn't even hold a t-shirt without stretching and fear of ripping. BUT, that can be replaced. Again, for the price these are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: starbright

customer_reviews.title: Simple stocking, that does the job of being double stuffed.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for Christmas in July. All the kids got one, and our guests brought 12 small items to stuff the stocking, 1 for each kid. Let's just say 25 adults, it held alot of goodies.
customer_reviews.author: Zabe_party7

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: I stuffed them as presents for my nieces and nephews and they were exactly what I wanted. I looked and looked everywhere before I found these and I was VERY pleased. I’ll be ordering them again for Christmas this year!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Huge and cute but had stains on them
customer_reviews.text: I would have been happy with this purchase if I hadn't opened the package to find every single sock had brown stains on it in various locations. I needed them for an event that week so didn't have time to return and find others.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth p

customer_reviews.title: Good Stockings for Bulk Purposes
customer_reviews.text: Typical thin, felt stockings that do well for a bulk stocking project. Not going to last you through childhood, but will pass for something like a work activity.
customer_reviews.author: Isometric Robot

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value!
customer_reviews.text: The price made it possible for us to make 12 new custom stockings, one for everyone at our Christmas dinner this year! Excellent quality, arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Fill it up !
customer_reviews.text: Way to big for what I needed them for. My fault. Should have measured before I ordered. Who knew there was numerous fireplace stocking sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Kuehl

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR OFFICE
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR OFFICE. TOOK HTV BEAUTIFULLY. WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND FOR WHEN YOU HAVE MUTIPLE YOU NEED TO BUY FOR. PRICE POINT WAS PERFECT. WILL CONTINUE TO USE THESE AS OUR DEPARTMENT GROWS.
customer_reviews.author: CDK

customer_reviews.title: They worked great, are super cute and all her friends were ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my college age daughter to fill with goodies and give to her roommates and friends. They worked great, are super cute and all her friends were happy to be able to hang stockings in their dorm rooms while away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S Lomonte

customer_reviews.title: great deal for decorating the office
customer_reviews.text: Used these to personalize and decorate the office. They are not very fuzzy which makes them easy to write on with glitter glue. They are good enough quality for work. I would not use them at home, because they do look a little chintzy. For the price they were a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Binard

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect, But Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Work decorations. Some stocking not sewn perfectly (seams pulled, or fabric bulges), but they are presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Considering Price
customer_reviews.text: We used these for staff stockings. They’re generously sized, considering how reasonable they are and I was able to embroider names on the white top without any of the thread pulling through because the felt didn’t hold up, and they supported a reasonable weight with mixed candies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for arts and crafts for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Was able to decorate each stocking with a child name. They held multiple gifts not a one broke. Will buy again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive and quality stockings
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive and quality stockings - definitely pleasantly surprised. Perfect for decorating with the family at Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe St.G

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: They're well made, but not as attractive as I hoped for. The fabric is not very sturdy, but I only needed to put some lightweight things in them. They might sag and stretch if stuffed--but I didn't try. Probably a good choice if you need many, inexpensive stockings.
customer_reviews.author: VMB

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when using glue to decorate them
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when decorating. The Glue on the top part leaked through the fabric and caused them to stick together. Overall ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Good value and nice weight and size.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these for last two years for my daughters kinder class. She loves them! The children decorate the stocking and take them home for Christmas. Nice product and size!
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: Love the stockings, very soft and pretty good size!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, well packaged and didn't come wrinkled. I used these stockings to customize them and add the kids name on them and came out perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: looks good in the office
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I just wanted to use some puffy paint on the white part and write coworkers name on them, these are exactly what I was looking for. They have hanging loops in them for ease of hanging... looks good in the office.
customer_reviews.author: DEEZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for decorating!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchase these for my youth group to decorate in our youth area. They are the perfect size and the material holds up very great! The felt material is very soft I would definitely be purchasing the stockings again. It was very easy to customize with this type of material. One more thing I would like to add is the inside is so roomy you can even fit a Bible in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Elizabeth Davis

customer_reviews.title: Christmas stocking for the Funny Farm animals!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for what I wanted. Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Employee stockings
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my staff Christmas gifts and they were able to hold lots of goodies. Thick felt
customer_reviews.author: GlamSlam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and size.
customer_reviews.text: These Christmas Holiday Stockings were just what I was looking for to stuff with Christmas presents. Excellent quality and great value for the reasonable price. I will buy them again for my Christmas presentations for next Christmas. Thank you!!!! You were a time saver and as my relatives said it was like getting another present when the gifts were inside these very nicely done Christmas stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, but incomplete package
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family reunion. As others have said, the quality is fine for a year or two.... Reason for only 3 stars is that there were only 10 in my pack. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Deb Fair

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for. Coworkers called them “old fashioned style”. Sure, but I like them!
customer_reviews.author: thompson.amber14

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Came fast, looked exactly as described, so reasonably priced; perfect for a large family gathering where we wanted to share "stocking gifts"! Would do business with this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Portianay

customer_reviews.title: The stockings were exactly as expected... Big ...
customer_reviews.text: The stockings were exactly as expected...Big enough to put certain presents in, and if not, a note saying that that person has a package...There was twelve of us, and will do this again next year.... However I need to get 12 more stockings for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a craft project for a personal care group. It was perfect and a great value. Priced similar items other places and they much more
customer_reviews.author: James Work

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy gift giving
customer_reviews.text: I use these every year ... as a festive gift wrap. Who doesn’t love a stocking?? For the price, they’re perfect 👌
customer_reviews.author: Team PCD

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy them again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use at work for our Secret Santa. They are simple but look nice. So far they seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great, cost-effective stockings. Not super high-quality or fancy, obviously, but perfect for the price. We personalized them ourselves by pasting felt lettering onto the top white part, and it worked out great for our big family!
customer_reviews.author: Rajeev goel

customer_reviews.title: They stockings were great and exactly what I needed for a family that ...
customer_reviews.text: They stockings were great and exactly what I needed for a family that includes 20 some people. Not expensive and quality enough to do what they needed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Conner

customer_reviews.title: Good for gifts and crafts.
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and was as expected. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hiangel

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quantity!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our family Christmas get together. They fit enough treats, and we were able to put names on each! Great price for the quantity!
customer_reviews.author: funnyladyjane

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled, thin
customer_reviews.text: Not the flannel stockings as the good old days. Seem cheaply made and arrived wrinkled. Worked in a pinch, but will replace next year with nicer ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Thin and cheap
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is so thin and flimsy they are practically transparent. If you want them for decoration only. they will do. They don’t look like they are sturdy enough to be used as filled stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great value, but certainly not the highest quality. Does what it is suppose to, but don't expect them to last long.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Stockings
customer_reviews.text: We buy these every Christmas to make stockings for our employees. They are about the same quality you would get at the dollar store so they’re not great if you plan on using them year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Amy and Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price, perfect size. I used glitter glue to write names. Everyone loves them!

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but lasted the day
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and you get what you expect. These were for a one-time use in my classroom.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect much for $1.00, but they are actually stitched and the =hangers are solid. Well worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: DrJoe

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I used them to make stockings for my dogs. A really good size for them. They feel a big cheap but it’s a good value for the money.

customer_reviews.title: good material. great price
customer_reviews.text: typical stockings. good material. great price. material able to be drawn on with Sharpie markers, but it was too fuzzy for accurate lettering. probably better to use something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Needed some stockings last minutes when I realized I couldn't find the ones I'd had in storage. These are a great value and a typical size - not too small. Good purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Love These

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Perfect descriptions. Thank you so much for making my ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Perfect descriptions. Thank you so much for making my family's Christmas that much more enjoyable. Shalom :)

customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a troop of girl scouts to fill for our local nursing home residents. The price was affordable and the size was just right.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and better than dollar store quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price and better than dollar store quality. I didn't have to run out and get these and I'm very happy with them.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!

customer_reviews.title: Nice stockings

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with promised delivery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas stocking, sure to go over big with my grand kids

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Holiday Item.

customer_reviews.title: Craft materials stuck on well for decorating and they made good treat bags for the kids at the Christmas party
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is thinner than I expected, but it suited it's purpose. Craft materials stuck on well for decorating and they made good treat bags for the kids at the Christmas party.

product_meta.title: Windy City Novelties Tall 15" Red Felt Christmas Holiday Stockings (12 Pack)
feature_bullets: CLASSIC CHRISTMAS ACCESSORY - Pack of 12 Red Felt 15” Tall Stockings with white cuff and gold accents to line your fireplace mantel
FULL-SIZE STOCKING – Lots of space inside to stuff to the brim with yuletide treats
CUSTOMIZEABLE – Personalize & embellish with markers, glitter, felt, puffy paint or embroidery for unique gifts, favors & stocking stuffers, or leave blank for a more traditional stocking look

GREAT GIVEAWAYS - Charity events, fundraisers, shelters & soup kitchens, can be filled with goodies, and they are perfect for family parties, schools, classrooms, clubs, offices, employees, restaurant staff & other big groups
BUY IN BULK - Pack of 12 at less than one dollar per stocking means big savings & more money in your pocket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars437 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
